metadata.title: CVE-2024-38619 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb-storage: alauda: Check whether the media is initialized The member"uzonesize" of struct alauda_info will remain 0 if alauda_init_media()fails, potentially causing divide errors in alauda_read_data() andalauda_write_lba(). - Add a member "media_initialized" to structalauda_info. - Change a condition in alauda_check_media() to ensure thefirst initialization. - Add an error check for the return value ofalauda_init_media().

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
